divs: Sighting DetailsI observed two star like objects in the sky one of the objects hovers left of the moon when i ran in the house to tell my brother to look and came back out swside the image begin to hover behind a cloud lightening began striking in the area the object hovered, The object was above the clouds it seem to be almost as far as stars int he sky
Summary: I observed two like objects in the sky i knoew they were not stars
